commit.message: Add frequent contacts to Payments Screen
Prioritize the contacts that payments are sent to
Cleanup code, add copyright information

nodes.bodyText:
This is commented out until I determine which contacts should be included.  Currently all payable contacts are included, even those we didn't accept.
Actually, the Live data should do this filter before it posts the results.
This is probably now in 3 adapter classes.  It can be refactored to a utility class.

@@ -0,0 +1,77 @@
+/*

+ * along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
+ */
+
+package de.schildbach.wallet.ui.dashpay
+
+import android.view.LayoutInflater
+import android.view.ViewGroup
+/*
+ * Copyright 2020 Dash Core Group
+ *
+ * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
+ * you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
+ * You may obtain a copy of the License at
+ *
+ *    http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
+ *
+ * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
+ * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+ * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+ * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+ * limitations under the License.
+ */
+import androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView
+import de.schildbach.wallet.data.UsernameSearchResult
+import org.dashevo.dpp.util.HashUtils
+import java.math.BigInteger
+
+class FrequentContactsAdapter() :
+        RecyclerView.Adapter<FrequentContactViewHolder>() {
+
+    init {
+        setHasStableIds(true)
+    }
+
+    var itemClickListener: OnContactItemClickListener? = null
+    var results: ArrayList<UsernameSearchResult> = arrayListOf()
+        set(value) {
+            field = value
+            notifyDataSetChanged()
+        }
+
+    override fun onCreateViewHolder(parent: ViewGroup, viewType: Int): FrequentContactViewHolder {
+         return FrequentContactViewHolder(LayoutInflater.from(parent.context), parent, itemClickListener)
+    }
+
+    override fun getItemCount(): Int {
+        return results.size
+    }
+
+    private fun getLongValue(s: String): Long {
+        val byteArray = HashUtils.byteArrayFromString(s)
+        val bigInteger = BigInteger(byteArray)
+        return bigInteger.toLong()
+    }

nodes.bodyText: This is where the contactRequests.data should be filtered to only use the proper contacts for the rest of the "calculations"

commit.message: Adjust alignment
Use fully established contacts only
Refactor getLongValue out of all adapters
Handle case of no blockchain identity
Add scope to FrequentContactsLiveData
Change coroutine scope on notifications live data classes
Refactored NotificationsAdapter, moved ViewHolder's to separate classes, optimised code
Further refactoring of NotificationAdapter, replaced ContactViewHolder and ContactRequestViewHolder with a single class NotificationViewHolder
Final improvements of NotificationsAdapter and related data model
Changed the way of displaying TransactionDetailsDialogFragment
Code refactoring

Merge branch 'user-profile-transaction-history' of https://github.com/dashevo/dash-wallet into dashpay-frequent-contacts

# Conflicts:
#	wallet/src/de/schildbach/wallet/ui/dashpay/NotificationsAdapter.kt
Added a missing comment from https://github.com/dashevo/dash-wallet/pull/473
Removed debugging code
Code refactoring

Merge branch 'evonet-develop' into user-profile-transaction-history-bis

# Conflicts:
#	wallet/res/layout/receive_info_view.xml
Improved id generation for HeaderViewItem and ImageViewItem
Merge branch 'user-profile-transaction-history' into dashpay-frequent-contacts
Improved `NotificationsAdapter.getItemId` method for NOTIFICATION_HEADER and NOTIFICATION_EMPTY.
